title: Best of The Herd for May 11, 2020

description:
The Michael Jordan/David Stern suspension conspiracy is dumb

UFC wasn't scared of backlash and it paid off over the weekend

Where Colin was right and wrong

Guest: David Falk, Michael Jordan's Agent
